amendment.description: To transfer funds from the Disaster Relief fund to the Social Security Administration for necessary expenses and direct or indirect losses related to the consequences of Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 season.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3732 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3732 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S4014-4016; text: CR S4015) To transfer funds from the Disaster Relief fund to the Social Security Administration for necessary expenses and direct or indirect losses related to the consequences of Hurricane Katrina and other hurricanes of the 2005 season.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3732 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3732 proposed by Senator Grassley.
